long_description: This dark, narrow, L-Shaped corridor is covered in dust and cobwebs on the ceilings and floor.  There are several piles of skeletons along the walls.  There seems to be a shiny object underneath the pile on the east most end, but will require some digging.
short_description: Corridor with piles of skeletons, containing a shiny object beneath them.  There is also a lantern in the middle of the hall.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: This can be lit with hero's torch.

Skeleton_Pile.name: Skeleton_Pile
Skeleton_Pile.description: This pile of skeletons appears to have a shiny object lying beneath it.
